field.label: SIP Contacts
field.help: Permanant contacts assigned to this AoR. i.e. sip:10.0.0.1:5060 or sip:sbc@example.com. Use TAB key to complete typing a SIP URI.
field.hint: Enter sip:URI[:port] here. Finish with TAB.

field.label: Max Contacts
field.help: Maximum contacts that can bind to this AoR (default: "0")

field.label: Outbound Proxy
field.help: Proxy through which to send OPTIONS requests, a full SIP URI must be provided

field.label: Max Expiration
field.help: Minimum time to keep an AoR (default: "60")

field.label: Max Expiration
field.help: Maximum time to keep an AoR (default: "7200")

field.label: Qualify Frequency
field.help: Interval at which to qualify an AoR (default: "0")

field.label: Additional Options
field.help: These lines will be added to the end of this AoR section. One option per line in the format of ConfigOption=Value
